name: FindCare – Web App | Pune-Based Doctor Booking Platform
desc: Developed a responsive web application to help Pune residents search for doctors and book appointments online.

name: Real-Time Cryptocurrency Price Tracker and Graph Visualization
desc: Developed a dynamic web application that fetches and displays real-time cryptocurrency prices using  CoinGecko API.

name: Personal Finance Dashboard
desc: Facilitating user’s can manually enter their income and expenses in order to track their expenses.

name: Headphone suggestions webpage
desc: Built an interactive webpage that recommends headphones based on user preferences like price, type (wired/wireless), and use-case (gaming, music, work).

name: Dynamic Calculator
desc: Developed a responsive web-based calculator that performs basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division).

name: Landing page
desc: Designed and developed a visually appealing landing page with responsive layout for all screen sizes.
